div.a: BOE Public Hearing on the 2020/2021 Budget and Regular Business Session

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: Board of Education Meeting - Tuesday, April 28, 2020, at 7:00 p.m.

div.p:
The Regular Business Meeting – Public Hearing of the Board of Education scheduled for Tuesday, April 28, 2020, at 7:00 p.m. at Watchung Hills Regional High School originally scheduled to be held in the Media Center will now be held remotely via Zoom. The meeting will go immediately into executive session for the purpose of discussing confidential personnel matters, PSA negotiations, and a WHREA grievance, after which action may be taken. The public portion of the meeting is expected to begin at approximately 7:30 p.m.
You may join the meeting using the following link:

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us04web.zoom.us/j/72586125759?pwd=d2Z0QTk3aTVzL2FQa3V3MlFva2NpQT09

Watchung Hills Regional High School will be closing our building and implementing a distance learning plan effective Monday, March 16, 2020 through Friday, May 15, 2020. All field trips, school events, and activities are also postponed, effective Saturday, March 14, 2020. For more information please review our Health Related School Closure Information.
